name: Goldeneye the Demake
description:
This is a DeMake of the original 1997 Goldeneye 007 from the Nintendo 64. There is only one level, The Facility, and it's nowhere near as good as the original, but it has a feeling all of its own. This game has been turned into a top-down shooter.

this game was made in 48 hours during the Nashville Game Jam.

Creators of this version are Patrick Granato and Daniel Ledford.
